General.Name: Beijing Hanyi Innovation Technology Co. Ltd. A
General.Description: Beijing Hanyi Innovation Technology Co., Ltd. provides type design, font product development, Chinese information technology research, and application solution activities for Chinese characters. The company offers a range of font solutions for various scenarios, including fulltype compact fonts, global multi-language fonts, color fonts and dynamic fonts, web fonts and bitmap fonts, etc. It also sells its products internationally. The company was founded in 1993 and is based in Beijing, China.
